page.title: 06Malcolm a student
page.content: Malcolm comes from the Isle of Man and has been at Atlantic College for two years.In term time he has to get up at 7.30a.m. in time to have breakfast at 8a.m.He then goes to lessons at 8.30. Malcolm is studying for his exam which is called an International Baccalaureate.He studies Geography, Spanish,Maths,English,Physics and Marine Science.Lunch is at 12 noon and lessons finish at 1.15pm.In the afternoon Malcolm has no lessons,but works as a R.N.L.I. crewman.This is part of his community service,which all college students have to take.As a crew member he could be called out anytime day or night.He shares a chalet with 3 other students.He has two holidays a year.Four weeks at Xmas and eight in the summer.
